div.div: Children are people that are experiencing the world and understanding their role in the world. They need a mentor or adult that can advice them while they are growing. These people should pay close attention to how they conduct, encouraging them to do the right things by being an example. These people could be staff or outside volunteers. All the conditions of health, safety, responsibilities, shelter, food, hygiene, joy, compassionate environment, guidance and discipline also apply to the staff and volunteers.
